ValidationRule.description: Agreement Territory approval is required for progressing past Discovery stage
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'New_Business', ISPICKVAL( Business_Group__c, 'MSP'), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Type , 'De-book Re-book')), OR( ISPICKVAL( MSP_Agreement_Territory_Approval__c , 'Pending'), ISPICKVAL( MSP_Agreement_Territory_Approval__c , 'Rejected') ), OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Validation'), ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Tech Evaluation'), ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Negotiation'), ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Commit'), ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Order In Process'), ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Closed Won') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: 'You need the 'MSP Agreement Territory Approval' to proceed.
